name: Blazing Scorcher
description: [ACCELERATE] (You may pay [1] [Fury] as an additional cost to have me enter ready.)

name: Brazen Buccaneer
description: As you play me, you may discard a card as an additional cost. If you do, reduce my cost by [2].
flavor_text: "They called my crew 'scurvy dogs,' and I took that personally."

name: Chemtech Enforcer
description:
[ASSAULT] (+2 [Might] while I'm an attacker.)
When you play me, discard 1.
flavor_text: "Knock, knock."

name: Cleave
description:
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)

Give a unit [ASSAULT 3] this turn. (+3 [Might] while it's an attacker.)
flavor_text: Nobody ever won a war without attacking.

name: Disintegrate
description:
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)

Deal 3 to a unit at a battlefield. If this kills it, draw 1.
flavor_text:
"Ashes, ashes, they all fall down." 
-Annie

name: Flame Chompers
description: When you discard me, you may pay [Fury] to play me.
flavor_text:
"GET 'EM, CHOMPIES!" 
-Jinx

name: Get Excited!
description:
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Discard 1. Deal its Energy cost as damage to a unit at a battlefield. (Ignore its Power cost.)
flavor_text:
"Everybody, panic!"
-Jinx

name: Hextech Ray
description:
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Deal 3 damage to a unit at a battlefield.
flavor_text:
Destroy. Then Improve.
- Viktor

name: Magma Wurm
description: Other friendly units enter ready.
flavor_text: A river of flame in an ocean of ice.

name: Noxus Hopeful
description: [LEGION] I cost [2] less. (Get the effect if you've played another card this turn.)
flavor_text: First to the front, first to glory.

name: Pouty Poro
description: [Deflect] (Opponents must pay [power] to choose me with an ability or spell)

name: Sky Splitter
description:
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)

This spell's Energy cost is reduced by the highest Might among units you control. 
Deal 5 to a unit at a battlefield.
flavor_text: "Puny mortals!" -Volibear

name: Captain Farron
description: Other friendly units here have [ASSAULT] (+1 [Might] while they're attackers.)
flavor_text: "Foward! Always!"

name: Dangerous Duo
description: [LEGION] - When you play me, give a unit +2 [Might] this turn. (Get the effect if you've played another card this turn.)

name: Iron Ballista
description:
This enters exhausted.
[TAP]: Deal 2 to a unit at a battlefield.
flavor_text: There's no way that can hit us at this dist-AUGH!

name: Noxus Saboteur
description: Your opponents' [HIDDEN] cards can't be revealed here.
flavor_text: Nothing fails like a perfect plan.

name: Raging Soul
description: If you've discarded a card this turn, I have [ASSAULT] and [GANKING]. (+1 [MIGHT] while I'm an attacker. I can move from battlefield to battlefield)

name: Scrapyard Champion
description: [LEGION] When you play me, discard 2, then draw 2. (Get the effect if you've played another card this turn.)
flavor_text: "Last one standing" is a bit subjective.

name: Sun Disc
description: [TAP]: [LEGION] - The next unit you play this turn enters ready. (Get the effect if you've played another card this turn.)
flavor_text:
Those who follow me follow destiny!
- Azir

name: Thermo Beam
description:
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns)
Kill all gear.
flavor_text:
Turn the limiter off, the beam is totally stable.
- Common Last Words

name: Unlicensed Armory
description: Discard 1, [TAP]: Choose a friendly unit. The next time it dies this turn, you may pay [FURY] to recall it exhausted instead. (Send it to base. This isn't a move.)

name: Void Seeker
description:
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)

Deal 4 to a unit at a battlefield. Draw 1.
flavor_text:
"it's a good day for a hunt." 
-Kai'Sa

name: Blind Fury
description:
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Each opponent reveals the top card of their Main Deck. Choose one and play it, ignoring its cost.
Then recycle the rest.

name: Brynhir Thundersong
description: When you play me, opponents can't play cards this turn.
flavor_text: Silence, The Sky Speaks

name: Darius, Trifarian
description: When you play your second card in a turn, give me +2 [Might] this turn and ready me.
flavor_text: "With overwhelming force."

name: Darius, Trifarian
description: When you play your second card in a turn, give me +2 [Might] this turn and ready me.
flavor_text: "With overwhelming force."

name: Draven, Showboat
description: My might is increased by your points.
flavor_text: "Let's admire me for a bit."

name: Falling Star
description:
Do this twice:
Deal 3 to a unit. (You can choose different units.)

name: Jinx, Demolitionist
description:
[ACCELERATE] (You may pay [1] [Fury] as an additional cost to have me enter ready.)
[ASSAULT 2] (+2 [Might] while I'm an attacker.)
When you play me, discard 2.
flavor_text: "I really need a new gun. But don't tell my other guns."

name: Jinx, Demolitionist
description:
[ACCELERATE] (You may pay [1] [Fury] as an additional cost to have me enter ready.)
[ASSAULT 2] (+2 [Might] while I'm an attacker.)
When you play me, discard 2.
flavor_text: "I really need a new gun. But don't tell my other guns."

name: Raging Firebrand
description: When you play me, the next spell you play this turn costs [5] less.

name: Ravenborn Tome
description: [TAP]: The next spell you play deals 1 Bonus Damage (Each instance of damage the spell deals is increased by 1.)
flavor_text: The book is bound in flame-reistant materials, for obvious reasons.

name: Shakedown
description:
[REACTION] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Choose an enemy unit. Deal 6 to it unless its controller has you draw 2.
flavor_text: Blink once for yes.

name: Tryndamere, Barbarian
description: When I conquer after an attack, if you assigned 5 or more excess damage to enemy units, you score 1 Point.
flavor_text: "You never stood a chance."

name: Vayne, Hunter
description:
[ASSAULT 3] (+3 [Might] while I'm an attacker.)
If an opponent controls a battlefield, I enter ready.
When I conquer, you may pay [1] to return me to my owner's hand.
flavor_text: "On wings of night."

name: Vi, Destructive
description:
[GANKING] (I can move from battlefield to battlefield.)
Recycle 1 from your trash: Give me +1 [Might] this turn.
flavor_text: "Punch first. Ask questions while punching."

name: Immortal Phoenix
description:
[ASSAULT 2] (+2 [Might] while I'm an attacker.)

When you kill a unit with a spell, you may pay [1] [Fury] to play me from your trash.
flavor_text: The memory of every death fuels even brighter flames.

name: Kai'Sa, Survivor
description:
[ACCELERATE] (You may pay [1] [FURY] as an additional cost to have me enter ready.)
When I conquer, draw 1.
flavor_text: I like it here, I might stay.

name: Kai'Sa, Survivor
description:
[ACCELERATE] (You may pay [1] [FURY] as an additional cost to have me enter ready.)
When I conquer, draw 1.
flavor_text: I like it here, I might stay.

name: Seal of Rage
description: [Tap]: [REACTION] - [ADD] [Fury]. (Abilities that add resources can't be reacted to.)

name: Volibear, Furious
description:
[DEFLECT 2] (Opponents must play [Rune][Rune] to choose me with a spell or effect.)
When I attack, deal 5 damage split among any number of enemy units here.
flavor_text: "I split mountains with my roar!"

name: Volibear, Furious
description:
[DEFLECT 2] (Opponents must play [Rune][Rune] to choose me with a spell or effect.)
When I attack, deal 5 damage split among any number of enemy units here.
flavor_text: "I split mountains with my roar!"

name: Charm
description: Move an enemy unit.
flavor_text:
"There's no harm in looking." 
-Common last words

name: Clockwork Keeper
description: As you play me, you may pay [Calm] as an additional cost. If you do, draw 1.
flavor_text: It always goes back for seconds.

name: Defy
description:
[REACTION] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)

Counter a spell that costs no more than [4] and no more than [Rune].
flavor_text: "No."

name: En Garde
description:
[REACTION] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Give a friendly unit +1 [Might] this turn, then an additional +1 [Might] this turn if it is the only unit you control there.
flavor_text: "Is this supposed to be a challenge?" -Fiora

name: Find Your Center
description:
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
If an opponent's score is within 3 points of the Victory Score, this costs [2] less.
Draw 1 and channel 1 rune exhausted.
flavor_text: One does not wait for the perfect moment.

name: Meditation
description:
[REACTION] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
As an additional cost to play this, you may exhaust a friendly unit. If you do, draw 2. Otherwise, draw 1.

name: Playful Phantom
flavor_text: "My toys break so easily."

name: Rune Prison
description:
[Action] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Stun a unit. (It doesn't deal combat damage this turn.)
flavor_text:
"Be Still!"
-Ryze

name: Solari Shieldbearer
description: When you play me, stun a unit. (It doesn't deal combat damage this turn.)
flavor_text: "Discipline is our shield."

name: Stalwart Poro
description: [Shield1] (I have +1 might while defending)
flavor_text: It suits him

name: Stand United
description:
[HIDDEN] (Hide now for [Rune] to react with later for [0].)
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Buff a friendly unit. Buffs give an additional +1 [Might] to friendly units this turn. (To buff a unit, give it a +1 [Might] buff if it doesn't already have one.)

name: Sunlit Guardian
description:
[Shield] (+1 [Might] while I'm a defender.)
[Tank] (I must be assigned combat damage first.)
flavor_text: Nobody ever won a war without defending.

name: Wielder of Water
description: While I'm attacking or defending alone, I have +2 [Might].
flavor_text: Each drop an ocean of possibilities.

name: Adaptatron
description: When I conquer, you may kill a gear. If you do, buff me. (If I don't have a buff, I get a +1 [Might] buff.)
flavor_text: There's a scrap for that.

name: Block
description:
[HIDDEN]  (Hide now for [Rune] to react with later for [0].)
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)

Give a unit [SHIELD 3] and [TANK] this turn. (+3 [Might] while it's a defender. It must be assigned combat damage first.)

name: Discipline
description:
[REACTION] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)

Give a unit +2 [Might] this turn. Draw 1.
flavor_text: A blade is only as sharp as the one who wields it.

name: Eclipse Herald
description: When you stun an enemy unit, ready me and give me +1 [Might] this turn.
flavor_text: An omen as terrifying as that which follows.

name: Mask of Foresight
description: When a friendly unit attacks or defends alone, give it +1 [Might] this turn.
flavor_text: To know the future, you must first accept it.

name: Reinforce
description: Look at the top 5 cards of you Main Deck. You may play a unit from among them. Its Energy cost is reduced by [5]. Then recycle the remaining cards.

name: Spirit's Refuge
description:
When you play this, buff a friendly unit. (If it doesn't have a buff, it gets a +1 [Might] buff.)
Friendly buffed units have [DEFLECT] if they didn't already. (Opponents must pay [Rune] to choose those units with a spell or ability.)

name: Wind Wall
description:
[REACTION] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Counter a spell.
flavor_text:
"Face the wind!" 
-Yasuo

name: Wizened Elder
description: While I'm buffed, I have an additional +1 [Might].
flavor_text: "I'm still fighting at my age. That should concern you more than it does."

name: Ahri, Alluring
description: When I hold, you score 1 point.
flavor_text: "Remember this moment."

name: Ahri, Alluring
description: When I hold, you score 1 point.
flavor_text: "Remember this moment."

name: Blitzcrank, Impassive
description:
[Tank] (I must be assigned combat damage first.)
When you play me to a battlefield, you may move an enemy unit to here.
When I hold, return me to my owner's hand.

name: Caitlyn, Patrolling
description:
I must be assigned combat damage last.
[Tap]: Deal damage equal to my Might to a unit at a battlefield. Use this ability only while I'm at a battlefield.
flavor_text: "I never miss."

name: Last Stand
description:
[Action] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Double a friendly unit's Might this turn. Give it [Temporary]. Kill it at the start of its controller's Beginning Phase, before scoring.)
flavor_text: Worth it.

name: Mageseeker Warden
description:
While I'm at a battlefield, opponents can only play units to their base.
While I'm at a battlefield, spells and abilities can't ready enemy units and gears.

name: Party Favors
description:
Each other player chooses Cards or Runes.
For each player that chooses Cards, you and that player each draw 1.
For each player that chooses Runes, you and that player each channel 1 rune exhausted.

name: Solari Shrine
description: When you kill a stunned enemy unit, you may exhaust this to draw 1.
flavor_text: The names of the fallen are a lesson for our descendants.

name: Sona, Harmonious
description: While I'm at a battlefield, ready 4 friendly runes at the end of your turn.
flavor_text: "The symphony never ends."

name: Taric, Protector
description:
[Shield] (+1 [Might] while I'm a defender.)
[Tank] (I must be assigned combat damage first.)
Other friendly units here have [Shield].
flavor_text: "Each life is a rare jewel."

name: Tasty Faefolk
description:
[Accelerate] (You may play [1] [Calm] as an additional cost to have me enter ready.)
[Deathknell] - Channel 2 runes exhausted and draw 1. (When I die, get the effect.)

name: Yasuo, Remorseful
description: When I attack, deal damage equal to my Might to an enemy unit here.
flavor_text: "Is a leaf's only purpose to fall?"

name: Yasuo, Remorseful
description: When I attack, deal damage equal to my Might to an enemy unit here.
flavor_text: "Is a leaf's only purpose to fall?"

name: Zhonya's Hourglass
description:
[HIDDEN] (Hide now for [Rune] to react with later for [0].)
The next time a friendly unit would die, kill this instead. Recall that unit exhausted. (Send it to base. This isn't a move.)

name: Lee Sin, Ascetic
description:
[SHIELD 3] (+1 [Might] while I'm a defender.)
[Tap]: Buff me. (I get a +1 [Might] buff.) 
I can have any number of buffs.
flavor_text: "Let us see whose spirit is stronger."

name: Lee Sin, Ascetic
description:
[SHIELD 3] (+1 [Might] while I'm a defender.)
[Tap]: Buff me. (I get a +1 [Might] buff.) 
I can have any number of buffs.
flavor_text: "Let us see whose spirit is stronger."

name: Leona, Zealot
description:
If an opponent's score is within 3 points of the Victory Score, I enter ready.
Stunned enemy units here have -8 [Might], to a minimum of 1 [Might].
flavor_text: "Feel the sun's glory!"

name: Leona, Zealot
description:
If an opponent's score is within 3 points of the Victory Score, I enter ready.
Stunned enemy units here have -8 [Might], to a minimum of 1 [Might].
flavor_text: "Feel the sun's glory!'

name: Mystic Reversal
description:
[Reaction] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Gain control of a spell. You may make new choices for it.
flavor_text: Good mages borrow, great mages steal.

name: Seal of Focus
description: [Tap]: [REACTION] - [ADD] [Calm]. (Abilities that add resources can't be reacted to.)

name: Whiteflame Protector
description: When you play me, give a unit +8 [Might] this turn.
flavor_text: A dragon is capable of nobility equal to its rage.

name: Consult the Past
description:
[Hidden] (Hide now for [power] to react with later for [0].)
[Reaction] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Draw 2.

name: Eager Apprentice
description: While I'm at a battlefield, the Energy costs for spells you play is reduced by [1], to a minimum of [1].
flavor_text: "As long as these thirty-seven things go right, it'll work every time!"

name: Falling Comet
description:
[Action] (play on your turn or in showdowns.)

Deal 6 to a unit at a battlefield.
flavor_text: Just an everyday celestial event.

name: Jeweled Colossus
description:
[Vision] (When you play me, look at the top card of your Main Deck. You may recycle it.)
[Shield] (+1 [Might] while I'm a defender.)

name: Lecturing Yordle
description:
[Tank] (I must be assigned combat damage first.)

When you play me, draw 1.
flavor_text: "....poisonous, but I didn't know that at the time. You see ... "

name: Mega-Mech
flavor_text:
Mech fights ahve two rules:
One- No Cheating.
Two- Don't get caught cheating

name: Orb of Regret
description: [Tap]: Give a unit -1 [Might] this turn, to a minimum of 1 [Might].
flavor_text:
"There's beauty in even the most painful memories."
- Ahri

name: Pit Crew
description: When you play a gear, ready me.
flavor_text: "GOOD ENOUGH LET'S GOOOOO!"

name: Riptide Rex
description: When you play me, deal 6 to an enemy unit at a battlefield.
flavor_text: "Rainin' fire!"

name: Smoke Screen
description:
[Reaction] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Give a unit -4 [Might] this turn, to a minimum of 1 [Might].
flavor_text: "Well, well, well. What have we here?"

name: Sprite Call
description:
[HIDDEN] (Hide now for [Rune] to react with later for [0].)
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)

Play a ready 3 [Might] Sprite unit token with [TEMPORARY]. (Kill it at the start of its controller's Beginning Phase, before scoring.)

name: Stupefy
description:
[REACTION] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Give a unit -1 [Might] this turn, to a minimum of 1 [Might]. Draw 1.
flavor_text: It's easier to outsmart an opponent with a concussion.

name: Watchful Sentry
description: [DEATHKNELL] - Draw 1. (When I die, get the effect.)
flavor_text: He may never see home again. But because of him, that home still stands.

name: Blastcone Fae
description:
[HIDDEN] (Hide now for [Rune] to react with later for [0].)
When you play me, give a unit -2 [Might] this turn, to a minimum of 1 [Might].

name: Energy Conduit
description: [Tap]: [Reaction] - [Add] [1]. (Abilities that add resources can't be reacted to.)
flavor_text: Whatever it does, it sure does a lot of it.

name: Garbage Grabber
description: Recycle 3 from your trash, [1], [Tap]: Draw 1.
flavor_text: The constructs of the in-between feed on whatever gets lost in the portals - mostly keys and left socks.

name: Gemcraft Seer
description:
[VISION] (When you play me, look at the top card of your Main Deck. You may recycle it.) 
Other friendly units have [VISION].
flavor_text: The light changes with every reflection

name: Mushroom Pouch
description: At the start of your Beginning Phase, if you control a facedown card at a battlefield, draw 1.
flavor_text:
"A Bandle Scout is always prepared!"
-Teemo

name: Portal Rescue
description:
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Banish a friendly unit, then play it to base, ignoring its cost.
flavor_text:
"Where do the portals go? You know, I've never asked."
-Norra

name: Ravenbloom Student
description: When you play a spell, give me +1 [Might] this turn.
flavor_text: A little knowledge is a dangerous thing. A lot of knowledge is awesome.

name: Retreat
description:
[Reaction] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Return a friendly unit to its owner's hand. Its owner channels 1 rune exhausted.
flavor_text: There's always tomorrow.

name: Singularity
description: Deal 6 to each of up to two units.
flavor_text: Two fates, very briefly intertwined.

name: Sprite Mother
description: When you play me, play a ready 3 [Might] Sprite unit token with [Temporary] here. (Kill it at the start of its controller's Beginning Phase, before scoring.)
flavor_text: "Come, little ones."

name: Ava Achiever
description: When I attack, you may pay [mind] to play a card with [hidden] from your hand here, ignoring its cost.
flavor_text: "I brought snacks!"

name: Convergent Mutation
description:
[Reaction] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Choose a friendly unit. Increase its Might until it equals the Might of another friendly unit.
flavor_text: "I don't know, I think it's kind of cute."

name: Ekko, Recurrent
description:
[ACCELERATE] (You may pay [1] [Mind] as an additional cost to have me enter ready.)
[DEATHKNELL] - Recycle me to ready your runes. (When I die, get the effect.)
flavor_text: "Time to start some trouble."

name: Heimerdinger, Inventor
description: I have all [Tap] abilities of all friendly legends, units and gear.
flavor_text: "I do love a good conundrum."

name: Kai'Sa, Evolutionary
description:
[GANKING] (I can move from battlefield to battlefield.)

When I conquer, you may play a spell from your trash with Energy cost less than your points without paying its Energy cost. Then recycle it. (You must still pay its Power cost.)

name: Kai'Sa, Evolutionary
description:
[GANKING] (I can move from battlefield to battlefield.)

When I conquer, you may play a spell from your trash with Energy cost less than your points without paying its Energy cost. Then recycle it. (You must still pay its Power cost.)

name: Malzahar, Fanatic
description: Kill a friend unit or gear, [tap] : [action] - [add] [rune] [rune]. (Use on your turn or in showdowns. Abilities that add resources can't be reacted to.)
flavor_text: "We demand sacrifice."

name: Progress Day
description: Draw 4.
flavor_text: See the dreams of a thousand tomorrows, and at such a low price!

name: Promising Future
description:
Each player looks at the top 5 cards of their Main Deck, chooses one, then recycles the rest. 
Starting with the next player, each player plays those cards, ignoring Energy costs. (They must still pay Power costs.)

name: Thousand-Tailed Watcher
description:
[Accelerate] (You may pay [1] [Mind] as an additional cost to have me enter ready.)
When you play me, give enemy units -3 [Might] this turn, to a minimum of 1 [Might].
flavor_text: You will know when you've pushed the wilds too far.

name: Viktor, Innovator
description: When you play a card on an opponent's turn, play a 1 [Might] Recruit unit token in your base.
flavor_text: "Join the glorious evolution"

name: Viktor, Innovator
description: When you play a card on an opponent's turn, play a 1 [Might] Recruit unit token in your base.
flavor_text: "Join the glorious evolution."

name: Wraith of Echoes
description: The first time a friendly unit dies each turn, draw 1.
flavor_text: His friends are with him in spirit.

name: Ahri, Inquisitive
description: When I attack or defend, give an enemy unit here -2 [Might] this turn, to a minimum of 1 [Might].
flavor_text: "The hunter and the hunted."

name: Ahri, Inquisitive
description: When I attack or defend, give an enemy unit here -2 [Might] this turn, to a minimum of 1 [Might].
flavor_text: "The hunter and the hunted."

name: Seal of Insight
description: [Tap]: [REACTION] - [ADD] [Mind]. (Abilities that add resources can't be reacted to.)

name: Teemo, Strategist
description:
[Hidden] (Hide now for [power] to react with later for [0].)

When I defend or I'm played from [Hidden], reveal the top 5 cards of your Main Deck. Deal 1 to an enemy unit here for each card with [Hidden], then recycle them.

name: Teemo, Strategist
description:
[Hidden] (Hide now for [power] to react with later for [0].)

When I defend or I'm played from [Hidden], reveal the top 5 cards of your Main Deck. Deal 1 to an enemy unit here for each card with [Hidden], then recycle them.

name: Time Warp
description: Take a turn after this one. Banish this.
flavor_text:
"Fool me once... and I'll just rewind."
- Ekko

name: Unchecked Power
description: Exhaust all friendly units, then deal 12 to all units at battlefields.
flavor_text: That's enough.

name: Arena Bar
description: [Tap]: Buff an exhausted friendly unit. (if it doesn't have a buff, it gets a +1 [Might] buff.)
flavor_text: "This one's on the house!"

name: Bilgewater Bully
description: While I'm buffed, I have [GANKING]. (I can move from battlefield to battlefield.)
flavor_text: Places to go, people to gank.

name: Cannon Barrage
description:
[Reaction] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)

Deal 2 to all enemy units in combat.
flavor_text: If you've got enough guns, you don't need to aim.

name: Challenge
description:
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Choose a friendly unit and an enemy unit. They deal damage equal to their Mights to each other.
flavor_text: "He started it when he hit me back!"

name: Confront
description:
[Action] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)

Units you play this turn enter ready.
Draw 1.
flavor_text: Now is the only moment that matters.

name: Crackshot Corsair
description: When I attack, deal 1 to an enemy unit here.
flavor_text: "Ahoy."

name: Dune Drake
description: When I attack, give me +2 [Might] if there is a ready enemy unit here.
flavor_text: Dragons hunt not just for food, but for the thrill of it.

name: First Mate
description: When you play me, ready another unit.
flavor_text: "it's a boarding party! Try to have some fun with it."

name: Flurry of Blades
description:
[Reaction] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)

Deal 1 to all units at battlefields.
flavor_text:
"Violence solves everything."
-Katarina

name: Mobilize
description: Channel 1 rune exhausted. If you can't, draw 1.
flavor_text: The sound of the trumpets is the first blow struck in battle.

name: Pakaa Cub
description: [Hidden] (Hide now for [Rune] to react with later for [0].)
flavor_text:
"Oh it's so cute!"
-Common last words

name: Pit Rookie
description: When you play me, buff another friendly unit. (If it doesn't have a buff, it gets +1 [might] buff.)
flavor_text: "Is that all you got?"

name: Stormclaw Ursine
description:
[TANK] (I must be assigned combat damage first.)
When you play me, channel 1 rune exhausted.
flavor_text:
"The Ursine speak for man, and the wild responds." 
-Volibear

name: Catalyst of Aeons
description: Channel 2 runes exhausted. If you couldn't channel 2 runes this way, draw 1.
flavor_text: Ages of strife, crystallized into eternity.

name: Cithria of Cloudfield
description: When you play another unit, buff me. (If I don't have a buff, I get a +1 [Might] buff.)
flavor_text: Every story starts small.

name: Herald of Scales
description: Your Dragons' Energy costs are reduced by [2], to a minimum of [1].
flavor_text: The language of dragons is a magic of its own.

name: Kinkou Monk
description: When you play me, buff two other friendly units. (Each one that doesn't have a buff gets a +1 [Might] buff.)
flavor_text: A master teaches the same lesson again and again, and learns something new each time.

name: Mountain Drake
flavor_text: After centuries spent trying to understand dragon behavior, researchers can agree on one thing: If you're seeing that behavior up close ... run.

name: Pirate's Haven
description: When you ready a friendly unit, give it +1 [Might] this turn.
flavor_text: It's the best place in the world, until you run out of coin.

name: Spoils of War
description:
[Reaction] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
If an enemy unit has died this turn, this costs [2] less.
Draw 2.
flavor_text: Waste nothing.

name: Unyielding Spirit
description:
[Reaction] (Play at any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Prevent all spell and ability damage this turn.
flavor_text: Battles are won in the heart before they are won on the field.

name: Wallop
description:
[Action] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
As you play this, you may spend a buff as an additional cost. If you do, ignore this spell's cost. Ready a unit.
flavor_text: If smashing doesn't work, just keep smashing.

name: Wildclaw Shaman
description: When you play me, you may spend a buff to buff me and ready me. (If I don't have a buff, I get a +1 [Might] buff.)
flavor_text: To channel nature's fury, a shaman must endure it.

name: Anivia, Primal
description: When I attack, deal 3 to all enemy units here.
flavor_text: "Do not tempt the blizzard."

name: Kraken Hunter
description:
[Accelerate] (You may pay [1] [body] as an additional cost to have me enter ready.)
[Assault] (+1 [might] while i'm an attacker.)

As you play me, you may spend any number of buffs as an additional cost. Reduce my cost by [body] for each buff you spend.

name: Lee Sin, Centered
description:
[Accelerate] (You may pay [1][Body] as an additional cost to have me enter ready.)
Other buffed friendly units at my battlefield have +2 [Might].
flavor_text: "Today will be a worthy test."

name: Lee Sin, Centered
description:
[Accelerate] (You may pay [1][Body] as an additional cost to have me enter ready.)
Other buffed friendly units at my battlefield have +2 [Might].
flavor_text: "Today will be a worthy test."

name: Mistfall
description: When you buff a friendly unit, you may pay [Body] and exhaust this to ready it.
flavor_text: Thousands of thwarted dreams, ready to be lifted anew.

name: Overt Operation
description:
[Action] (play on your turn or in showdowns.)

For each friendly unit, you may spend its buff to ready it. Then buff all friendly units. (Each one that doesn't have a buff gets a +1 [might] buff.)
flavor_text: "We can go deep undercover, sneak in through the back, and end this quietly. Or...."

name: Primal Strength
description:
[Action] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Give a unit +7 [Might] this turn.
flavor_text: There is savagery inside us all.

name: Qiyana, Victorious
description:
[Deflect] (Opponents must pay [power] to choose me with a spell or ability.)
When I conquer, draw 1 or channel 1 rune exhausted.
flavor_text: "Line them up. I will bend their knees."

name: Sabotage
description: Choose an opponent. They reveal their hand. Choose a non-unit card from it, and recycle that card.
flavor_text: Sometimes it takes dirty tricks to ensure a fair fight.

name: Udyr, Wildman
description:
Spend my buff: Choose one you've not chosen turn --

Deal 2 to a unit at a battlefield.
Stun a unit at a battlefield
Ready me.
Give me [GANKING] this turn.

name: Volibear, Imposing
description:
[SHIELD 3] (+3 [Might] while I'm a defender.)
[TANK] (I must be assigned combat damage first.)
When an opponent moves to a battlefield other than mine, draw 1. (Bases are not battlefields.)
flavor_text: "Gods do not beg. We take what is ours!"

name: Volibear, Imposing
description:
[SHIELD 3] (+3 [Might] while I'm a defender.)
[TANK] (I must be assigned combat damage first.)
When an opponent moves to a battlefield other than mine, draw 1. (Bases are not battlefields.)
flavor_text: "Gods do not beg. We take what is ours!"

name: Deadbloom Predator
description:
[DEFLECT] (Opponents must play [Rune] to choose me with a spell or effect.)

You may play me to an occupied enemy battlefield.
flavor_text: The souls of those who died unfulfilled coalesce into a form to sate those hungers.

name: Seal of Strength
description: [Tap]: [REACTION] - [ADD] [Body]. (Abilities that add resources can't be reacted to.)

name: Sett, Brawler
description:
When I'm played and when I conquer, buff me. (If I don't have a buff, I get a +1 [Might] buff.)
Spend my buff: Give me +4 [Might] this turn.
flavor_text: "Momma always said I had her temper."

name: Sett, Brawler
description:
When I'm played and when I conquer, buff me. (If I don't have a buff, I get a +1 [Might] buff.)
Spend my buff: Give me +4 [Might] this turn.
flavor_text: "Momma always said I had her temper."

name: Cemetery Attendant
description: When you play me, return a unit from your trash to your hand.
flavor_text: "Good boy! Now, where's the rest of 'em?"

name: Ember Monk
description: When you play a card from [hidden], give me +2 [might] this turn.
flavor_text: A flame bright enough to cast many shadows.

name: Fight or Flight
description:
[Hidden] (Hide now for [Rune] to react with later for [0].)
[Action] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Move a unit from a battlefield to its base.
flavor_text: "Boo."

name: Gust
description:
[REACTION] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Return a unit at a battlefield with 3 [Might] or less to its owner's hand.

name: Morbid Return
description:
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Return a unit from your trash to your hand.
flavor_text:
"Soon, this long cruel night will end. But not yet."
-Viego

name: Mystic Poro
description: [Vision] (When you play me, look at the top card of your Main Deck. You may recycle it.)
flavor_text: Forecast: Sunny, with a chance of snax.

name: Rebuke
description:
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Return a unit at a battlefield to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: "Get out."

name: Ride the Wind
description:
[Action] (play on your turn or in showdowns.) 

Move a friendly unit and ready it.
flavor_text: "Follow the wind, but watch your back." -Yasuo

name: Sai Scout
description:
[VISION] (When you play me, look at the top card of your Main Deck. You may recycle it.)
You may play me to an open battlefield.
flavor_text: "Ours for the taking!"

name: Sneaky Deckhand
description: You may play me to an open battlefield.
flavor_text:
"I like to think of her as a pre-boarding party."
-Miss Fortune

name: Stealthy Pursuer
description: When a friendly unit moves from my location, I may be moved with it.
flavor_text: "Anywhere you can go, I can go better."

name: Undercover Agent
description: [DEATHKNELL] - Discard 2, then draw 2. (When I die, get the effect.)
flavor_text: Even he no longer knew which side he worked for.

name: Acceptable Losses
description:
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Each player kills one of their gear.
flavor_text: "Never liked that sword anyway."

name: Fading Memories
description: Give a unit at a battlefield or a gear [temporary]. (Kill it at the start of its controller's Beginning Phase, before.)
flavor_text: You too shall pass.

name: Pack of Wonders
description: [Tap]: Return another friendly gear, unit, or [HIDDEN] card to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"I know I put it in here somewhere...." 
-Teemo

name: Scrapheap
description: When this is played, discarded, or killed, draw 1.
flavor_text: The parts that make it to the heap are the ones that DIDN'T blow up.

name: Stacked Deck
description:
[Action] (play on your turn or in showdowns.) 
Look at the top 3 cards of your Main Deck. Put 1 into your hand and recycle the rest.
flavor_text: "Just lucky, I guess."

name: The Syren
description: [1], [tap]: Move a friendly unit at a battlefield to your base.
flavor_text: Without a ship, a pirate's just another common criminal.

name: Traveling Merchant
description: When I move, discard 1, then draw 1.
flavor_text: Payment first, refund never.

name: Treasure Trove
description: When this leaves the board, draw 1 and channel 1 rune exhausted.
flavor_text: "We're gonna be rich!" -Common Last Words

name: Whirlwind
description: Starting with the next player, each player may return a unit to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"The storm approaches." 
-Janna

name: Zaunite Bouncer
description: When you play me, return another unit at a battlefield to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: If he had things his way, NOBODY would get in.

name: Kayn, Unleashed
description:
[GANKING] (I can move from battlefield to battlefield.)
If I have moved twice this turn, I don't take damage.
flavor_text: "I will survive eternity. They will die today."

name: Kog'Maw, Caustic
description: [Deathknell] - Deal 4 to all units at my battlefield. (When I die, get the effect)
flavor_text: "Oblivion come."

name: Maddened Marauder
description:
[TANK] (I must be assigned combat damage first.)
When you play me, move a unit from a battlefield to its base.
flavor_text: They know no fear. Nor much of anything else, really.

name: Mindsplitter
description: When you play me, choose an opponent. They reveal their hand. Choose a card from it, and they discard that card.
flavor_text: Its victims go mad deciding which half to run from first.

name: Miss Fortune, Buccaneer
description:
You may play me to an open battlefield.
Friendly units may be played to open battlefields.
flavor_text: "I always shoot first."

name: Miss Fortune, Buccaneer
description:
You may play me to an open battlefield.
Friendly units may be played to open battlefields.
flavor_text: "I always shoot first."

name: Nocturne, Horrifying
description: [Ganking] (I can move from battlefield to battlefield.) When you look at cards from the top of your deck (and don't draw them) and see me, you may play me for [power].

name: Rhasa the Sunderer
description: I cost [1] less for each card in your trash.
flavor_text: It feeds well on death, but better on madness.

name: Soulgorger
description: When you play me, you may play a unit from your trash, ignoring its Energy cost.

name: Teemo, Scout
description:
[HIDDEN] (Hide now for [Rune] to react with later for [0].)
When you play me, give me +3 [Might] this turn.
flavor_text: "Reporting in!"

name: Teemo, Scout
description:
[HIDDEN] (Hide now for [Rune] to react with later for [0].)
When you play me, give me +3 [Might] this turn.
flavor_text: "Reporting in!"

name: The Harrowing
description: Play a unit from your trash, ignoring its Energy cost. (You must still pay its Power cost.)

name: Tideturner
description:
[hidden] (Hide now for [power] to react with later for [0].)

When you play me, you may choose a friendly unit. Move me to its location and it to my original location.

name: Twisted Fate, Gambler
description:
When I attack, reveal the top rune of your rune deck, then recycle it. Do one of the following based on its domain:
[Fury] - Deal 2 to an enemy unit here and 1 to all other enemy units here.
[Mind] - Draw 1.
[Order] - Stun an enemy unit.

name: Invert Timelines
description: Each player discards their hand, then draws 4.
flavor_text:
"Good a time as any to act reckless."
- Ekko

name: Jinx, Rebel
description: When you discard one or more cards, ready me and give me +1 [Might] this turn.
flavor_text: "Rules are made to be broken. Like buildings! Or people!"

name: Jinx, Rebel
description: When you discard one or more cards, ready me and give me +1 [Might] this turn.
flavor_text: "Rules are made to be broken. Like buildings! Or people!"

name: Possession
description:
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Choose an enemy unit at a battlefield. Take control of it and recall it. (Send it to your base. This isn't a move.)
flavor_text: Some have a change of heart. Others need you to change it for them.

name: Seal of Discord
description: [Tap]: [REACTION] - [ADD] [Chaos]. (Abilities that add resources can't be reacted to.)

name: Yasuo, Windrider
description:
[GANKING] (I can move from battlefield to battlefield.)
The third time I move in a turn, you score 1 point.
flavor_text: "I will follow this path until the end."

name: Yasuo, Windrider
description:
[GANKING] (I can move from battlefield to battlefield.)
The third time I move in a turn, you score 1 point.
flavor_text: "I will follow this path until the end."

name: Back to Back
description:
[REACTION] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Give two friendly units each +2 [Might] this turn.
flavor_text: Fight together or die alone.

name: Call to Glory
description:
[REACTION] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
As you play this, you may spend a buff as an additional cost. If you do, ignore this spell's cost.
Give a unit +3 [Might] this turn.

name: Cruel Patron
description: As an additional cost to play me, kill a friendly unit.
flavor_text: Fealty is a duty, not a choice.

name: Cull the Weak
description: Each player kills one of their units.
flavor_text: What good is having a plank if nobody ever walks it?

name: Daring Poro
description: [ASSAULT] (+1 [Might] while I'm an attacker.)
flavor_text: Don't worry, they love it.

name: Faithful Manufactor
description: When you play me, play a 1 [Might] Recruit unit token here.
flavor_text: Hard work is its own reward.

name: Forge of the Future
description:
When you play this, play a 1 [might] Recruit unit token at your base.

Kill this: Recycle up to 4 cards from trashes.
flavor_text: "What do you make? Beats me, but we do it better than anyone else."

name: Hidden Blade
description:
[HIDDEN] (Hide now for [Rune] to react with later for [0].)
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Kill a unit at a battlefield. Its controller draws 2.
flavor_text: Not every Noxian decree is read aloud.

name: Petty Officer
description: [ASSAULT] (+1 [Might] while I'm an attacker.)
flavor_text: Cross him and you'll learn just how petty he can be.

name: Soaring Scout
description: [DEATHKNELL] - Channel 1 rune exhausted. (When I die, get the effect.)
flavor_text:
"Show us a path!" 
-Ashe

name: Trifarian Gloryseeker
description: [LEGION] When you play me, buff me. (If I don't have a buff, I get a +1 [Might] buff. Get the effect if you've played another card this turn.)
flavor_text: War demands your life but offers immortality.

name: Vanguard Captain
description: [LEGION] - When you play me, play two 1 [Might] Recruit unit token here. (Get the effect if you've played another card this turn.)
flavor_text: "Soldiers, to me!"

name: Vanguard Sergeant
flavor_text: He knew his orders: hold the line, or there would be nothing left to hold.

name: Facebreaker
description:
[hidden] (Hide now for [power] to react with later for [0].)

[action] (play on your turn or in showdowns.)

Stun a friendly unit and an enemy unit at the same battlefield. (They don't deal combat damage this turn.)
flavor_text: "Play nice!" - Sett

name: Imperial Decree
description: [action] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.) When any unit takes damage this turn, kill it.
flavor_text: "With a word, I end you." -Azir

name: Noxian Drummer
description: When I move to a battlefield, play a 1 [Might] Recruit unit token here. (It is also at the battlefield.)

name: Peak Guardian
description: When you play me, buff me. Then, if I am at a battlefield, buff all other friendly units there. (To buff a unit give it a +1 [might] if it doesn't already have one.)
flavor_text: Mount Targon's blessing is besowed upon those who have proven that they are strong enoguh without it.

name: Salvage
description:
[Action] (play on your turn or in showdowns.) 
You may kill a gear. Draw 1.
flavor_text: One person's treasure is another one's trash.

name: Solari Chief
description: When you play me, choose an enemy unit. If it is stunned, kill it. Otherwise, stun it. (it doesn't deal combat damage this turn.)
flavor_text: The sun has many rays, each tasked with driving out the darkness.

name: Spectral Matron
description: When you play me, you may play a unit costing no more than [3] and no more than [RUNE] from your trash, ignoring its cost.
flavor_text: "Come - there is use for you yet."

name: Symbol of the Solari
description: If a combat where you are the attacker ends in a tie, recall ALL units instead. (Send them to base. This isn't a move. Ties are calculated after combat damage is dealt.)
flavor_text: "Next time, try to leave a dent!" -Leona

name: Vanguard Helm
description: When a buffed friendly unit dies, buff another friendly unit. (If it doesn't have a buff, it gets a +1 [might] buff.)
flavor_text: Vanguard soldier share both a helm and a vision.

name: Vengeance
description: Kill a unit.
flavor_text: A brief moment of turmoil -- then peace.

name: Albus Ferros
description:
When you play me, spend any number of buffs.
For each buff spent, channel 1 rune exhausted.
flavor_text: In Piltover, the best way to become a great inventor is to find a great investor.

name: Commander Ledros
description:
As you play me, you may kill any number of friendly units as an additional cost. Reduce my cost by [Order] for each killed this way.
[Deflect] (Opponents must pay [Rune] to choose me with a spell or ability.)
[Ganking] (I can move from battlefield to battlefield.)

name: Fiora, Victorious
description: While I'm [Mighty], I have [Deflect], [Ganking] and [Shield]. (I'm Mighty while I have 5+ [Might].)
flavor_text: "I long for a worthy opponent."

name: Harnessed Dragon
description: When you play me, kill an enemy unit.
flavor_text: What bends a dragon's will is not strength, but sense of purpose.

name: Karma, Channeler
description:
[Vision] (When you play me, look at the top card of your Main Deck. You may recycle it.)

When you recycle one or more cards, buff a friendly unit. (If it doesn't have a buff, it gets a +1 [might] buff. Runes aren't cards.)
flavor_text: "Heart and mind as one."

name: King's Edict
description: Starting with the next player, each other player chooses a unit you don't control that hasn't been chosen for this spell. Kill those units.
flavor_text: Ruling is about making the hard choices. Serving is about living with the consequences.

name: Leona, Determined
description:
[SHIELD] (+1 [Might] while I'm a defender.)
When I attack, stun an enemy unit here. 
(It doesn't deal combat damage this turn.)
flavor_text: "First light approaches."

name: Machine Evangel
description: [DEATHKNELL] - Play three 1 [Might] Recruit unit tokens into your base. (When I die, get the effect.)
flavor_text: The future is built by those who never see it.

name: Sett, Kingpin
description:
[TANK] (I must be assigned combat damage first.)
I get +1 [Might] for each buffed friendly unit at my battlefield.
flavor_text: "Bein' the boss is a lot better than bein' the boss."

name: Sett, Kingpin
description:
[TANK] (I must be assigned combat damage first.)
I get +1 [Might] for each buffed friendly unit at my battlefield.
flavor_text: "Bein' the boss is a lot better than bein' the boss."

name: Shen, Kinkou
description:
[REACTION] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve, including to a battlefield you control.)
[SHIELD 2] (+2 [Might] while I'm a defender.)
[TANK] (I must be assigned combat damage first.)
flavor_text: "Tread carefully."

name: Baited Hook
description: [1] [order] [tap]: Kill a friendly unit. Look at the top 5 cards of your Main Deck. You may play a unit from among them that has Might up to 1 more than the killed unit, ignoring its cost. Then recycle the rest.
flavor_text: There's always a bigger fish -- sometimes a MUCH bigger fish.

name: Darius, Executioner
description:
[LEGION] - When you play me, ready me. (Get the effect if you've played another card this turn)

Other friendly units have +1 [Might] here.
flavor_text: "They will regret opposing me."

name: Darius, Executioner
description:
[LEGION] - When you play me, ready me. (Get the effect if you've played another card this turn)

Other friendly units have +1 [Might] here.
flavor_text: "They will regret opposing me."

name: Divine Judgment
description: Each player chooses 2 units, 2 gear, 2 runes, and 2 cards in their hands. Recycle the rest.
flavor_text: Equality isn't always equal.

name: Seal of Unity
description: [Tap]: [REACTION] - [ADD] [Order]. (Abilities that add resources can't be reacted to.)

name: Viktor, Leader
description: When another non-Recruit unit you control dies, play a 1 [Might] Recruit unit token into your base.
flavor_text: "I am the first of many."

name: Viktor, Leader
description: When another non-Recruit unit you control dies, play a 1 [Might] Recruit unit token into your base.
flavor_text: "I am the first of many."

name: Icathian Rain
description:
Do this 6 times: 
Deal 2 to a unit. (You can choose different units.)

name: Volibear, Relentless Storm
description: When you play a [MIGHTY] unit, you may exhaust me to channel 1 rune exhausted. (A unit is Mighty while it has 5+ [Might]

name: Stormbringer
description: Choose a friendly unit in your base. Deal damage equal to its Might to all enemy units at a battlefield, then move your unit there.

name: Jinx, Loose Cannon
description: At start of your Beginning Phase, draw 1 if you have 1 or fewer cards in your hand.

name: Super Mega Death Rocket!
description:
Deal 5 to a unit.
When you conquer, you may discard 1 to return this from your trash to your hand.

name: Darius, Hand of Noxus
description: [Tap] [REACTION], [LEGION] - [ADD] [1] (Abilities that add resources can't be reacted to. Get the effect if you've played a card this turn.)

name: Noxian Guillotine
description:
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Choose a unit. Kill it the next time it takes damage this turn.
[LEGION] - Kill it now instead. (Get the effect if you've played another card this turn.)

name: Ahri, Nine-Tailed Fox
description: When an enemy unit attacks a battlefield you control, give it -1 [Might] this turn, to a minimum of 1 [Might].

name: Fox-Fire
description:
[HIDDEN] (Hide now for [Rune] to react with later for [0].)
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Kill any number of units at a battlefield with total Might 4 or less.

name: Lee Sin, Blind Monk
description: [1], [Tap]: Buff a friendly unit. (If it doesn't have a buff, it gets a +1 [Might] buff.)

name: Dragon's Rage
description: Move an enemy unit. Then choose another enemy unit at its destination. They deal damage equal to their Mights to each other.

name: Yasuo, Unforgiven
description: [2], [Tap]: Move a friendly unit to or from your base.

name: Last Breath
description:
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Ready a friendly unit. It deals damage equal to its Might to an enemy at a battlefield.

name: Leona, Radiant Dawn
description: When you stun one or more enemy units, buff a friendly unit. (If it doesn't have a buff, it gets a +1 [Might] buff.)

name: Zenith Blade
description:
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)
Stun an enemy at a battlefield. You may move a friendly unit to that enemy unit's battlefield. (A stunned unit doesn't deal combat damage this turn.)

name: Teemo, Swift Scout
description:
You may pay [1] to hide a card with [HIDDEN] instead of [Rune].
[1], [Tap]: Put a Teemo unit you own into your hand from your Champion Zone or the board.

name: Guerilla Warfare
description: Return up to two cards with [HIDDEN]  from your trash to your hand. You can hide ignoring costs this turn.

name: Viktor, Herald of the Arcane
description: [1], [Tap]: Play a 1 [Might] Recruit unit token.

name: Siphon Power
description:
[REACTION] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Choose a battlefield. Give friendly units there +1 [Might] this turn and enemy units there -1 [Might] this turn, to a minimum of 1 [Might].

name: Miss Fortune, Bounty Hunter
description: [Tap]: Give a unit [GANKING] this turn. (It can move from battlefield to battlefield.)

name: Bullet Time
description:
[ACTION] (Play on your turn or in showdowns.)

Pay any amount of [Rune] to deal that much damage to all enemy units at a battlefield.

name: Sett, The Boss
description:
When a buffed unit you control would die, you may pay [Rune] and exhaust me to spend its buff and recall it exhausted instead. (Send it to base. This isn't a move.)
When you conquer, ready me.

name: Showstopper
description: Buff a friendly unit in your base, then move it to a battlefield. (If it doesn't have a buff, it gets a +1 [Might] buff.)

name: Recruit
flavor_text: "We are the future."

name: Recruit
flavor_text: "We are the future."

name: Recruit
flavor_text: "We are the future."

name: Sprite
description: [Temporary] (Kill me at the start of your Beginning Phase, before scoring.)
flavor_text: Dreams rarely linger, but the dreamer is still changed.

name: Altar to Unity
description: When you hold here, play a 1 [Might] Recruit unit token in your base.

name: Aspirant's Climb
description: Increase the points needed to win the game by 1.

name: Back-Alley Bar
description: When a unit moves from here, give it +1 [Might] this turn.

name: Bandle Tree
description: You may hide an additional card here.

name: Fortified Position
description: When you defend here, choose a unit. It gains [SHIELD 2] this combat. (+2 [Might] while It's a defender.)

name: Grove of the God-Willow
description: When you hold here, draw 1.

name: Hallowed Tomb
description: When you hold here, you may return your Chosen Champion from your trash to your Champion Zone if it is empty.

name: Monastery of Hirana
description: When you conquer here, you may spend a buff to draw 1.

name: Navori Fighting Pit
description: When you hold here, buff a unit here. (If it doesn't have a buff, it gets a +1 [Might] buff.)

name: Obelisk of Power
description: Players channel one additional rune during their first Runic Phase this game.

name: Reaver's Row
description: When you defend here, you may move a friendly unit here to base.

description: When you hold this, activate the conquer abilities of units here.

name: Sigil of the Storm
description: When you conquer here, recycle one of your runes.

name: Startipped Peak

name: The Candlelit Sanctum
description: When you conquer here, look at the top two cards of your Main Deck. You may recycle one or both of them. Put those you don't back in any order.

description: The first time you choose a friendly unit with a spell here each turn, draw 1.

name: Trifarian War Camp
description: Units here have +1 [Might]. (This includes attackers.)

name: Vilemaw's Lair
description: Units can't move from here to base.

name: Void Gate
description: Spells and abilities affecting units here each deal 1 Bonus Damage. (Each instance of damage the spell deals is increased by 1.)

name: Windswept Hillock
description: Units here have [GANKING]. (They can move from battlefield to battlefield.)

name: Zaun Warrens
description: When you conquer here, discard 1, then draw 1.

name: Sett, The Boss
description:
When a buffed unit you control would die, you may pay [Rune] and exhaust me to spend its buff and recall it exhausted instead. (Send it to base. This isn't a move.)
When you conquer, ready me.
